name: DadDeck™ - Pack Opening Social Features
description: Micro-tasks for social sharing, screenshots, and community features.

userStories.title: Add share button to pack results screen
userStories.description: Create share button in pack results UI.
acceptanceCriteria: Add share button (icon + label) to results
Button is clickable and has hover state
Test button is easy to find

userStories.title: Create share confirmation modal
userStories.description: Modal appears when share button clicked.
acceptanceCriteria: Modal shows on share button click
Modal backdrop closes modal on click

userStories.title: Add platform selection buttons to share modal
userStories.description: Show Twitter, Facebook, Copy Link options.

userStories.title: Implement Twitter share intent
userStories.description: Generate Twitter share URL with pre-filled text.
acceptanceCriteria: On Twitter button click, generate share URL
Pre-filled text: 'Check out my [rarity] pull in DadDeck!'
Test tweet opens in new tab with text

userStories.title: Implement Facebook share dialog
userStories.description: Generate Facebook share URL.
acceptanceCriteria: On Facebook button click, generate share URL
Test share opens in new tab

userStories.title: Implement clipboard copy link
userStories.description: Copy shareable link to clipboard.
acceptanceCriteria: On Copy Link button click, copy URL to clipboard
Generate unique pack URL (or main site URL)

userStories.title: Add custom message input field
userStories.description: Allow users to customize share text.
acceptanceCriteria: Add text input to share modal
User can edit text before sharing
Test custom message used in share

userStories.title: Add preset message templates
userStories.description: Quick-select message templates for sharing.
acceptanceCriteria: Presets: 'So excited!', 'Finally got a mythic!', 'Dad life!'
User can still edit after selecting preset

userStories.title: Add dad joke quotes to share templates
userStories.description: Include dad jokes in preset messages.
acceptanceCriteria: Create array of dad joke quotes
Add 'Dad Joke' category to preset dropdown
Examples: 'I yi yiyi!', 'Pull my finger', etc.
Randomly select joke when Dad Joke chosen
Test jokes add humor to shares

userStories.title: Capture card image on reveal
userStories.description: Generate screenshot of revealed card.
acceptanceCriteria: Use html2canvas library to capture card element
Generate screenshot when card fully revealed
Screenshot captures card art, stats, name

userStories.title: Add rarity watermark to card screenshots
userStories.description: Overlay rarity badge on shared screenshots.
acceptanceCriteria: After capturing card image, add rarity watermark

userStories.title: Add DadDeck logo to screenshots
userStories.description: Include logo branding on shared images.
acceptanceCriteria: Add DadDeck™ logo to all screenshots
Logo in bottom corner, subtle opacity
Test branding visible but not obtrusive

userStories.title: Implement batch screenshot for full pack
userStories.description: Create combined image of all cards in pack.
acceptanceCriteria: Add 'Screenshot All' button to share modal
Generate canvas with all 7 cards arranged
Cards arranged in grid (4 top, 3 bottom)
Include rarity watermarks on each card
Test full pack screenshot looks great

userStories.title: Add image download button
userStories.description: Allow users to download screenshot images.
acceptanceCriteria: Button generates screenshot and triggers download

userStories.title: Track share count per pack
userStories.description: Count how many times each pack is shared.
acceptanceCriteria: Add shareCount property to pack metadata
Increment count when share action completes
Show share count in pack history

userStories.title: Display shared pulls in history
userStories.description: Show which packs have been shared.
acceptanceCriteria: Add shared icon to history entries
Icon appears if pack was shared (shareCount > 0)
Icon shows share count as badge
Test users can see sharing history

userStories.title: Add share analytics event
userStories.description: Track share actions in analytics.
acceptanceCriteria: Log share event with: platform, packId, rarity
Send to Google Analytics or Plausible
Test events appear in analytics dashboard

userStories.title: Add Open Graph meta tags for sharing
userStories.description: Configure meta tags for rich link previews.
acceptanceCriteria: Add dynamic OG meta tags to page

userStories.title: Add Twitter Card meta tags
userStories.description: Configure Twitter-specific meta tags.

userStories.title: Create shareable pack URL
userStories.description: Generate unique URL for each pack (if backend exists).
acceptanceCriteria: URL displays pack in 'viewer only' mode
Pack can be viewed but not opened again

userStories.title: Add Reddit share button
userStories.description: Include Reddit in share options.
acceptanceCriteria: Test share opens Reddit submit page

userStories.title: Add WhatsApp share button
userStories.description: Include WhatsApp in share options.

userStories.title: Add Discord share button
userStories.description: Include Discord in share options.
acceptanceCriteria: Test share opens Discord or copies link

userStories.title: Implement QR code generation for sharing
userStories.description: Generate QR code linking to pack result.
acceptanceCriteria: Generate QR code for pack URL
Test QR code scans to correct URL

userStories.title: Add 'Share Again' button in history
userStories.description: Quick reshare of previously shared packs.
acceptanceCriteria: Add share button to history entries
Button only appears if pack was shared before
Clicking opens share modal with that pack
Test reshare is easy and convenient

userStories.title: Create share success notification
userStories.description: Show toast when share completes successfully.
acceptanceCriteria: After share action completes, show toast

userStories.title: Add share error handling
userStories.description: Gracefully handle share failures.
acceptanceCriteria: If share fails, show error toast

userStories.title: Add share privacy note
userStories.description: Inform users what data is shared.
acceptanceCriteria: Add small text: 'Only card image and rarity are shared'
Text is subtle, smaller font, gray color
Link to privacy policy if available

userStories.title: Implement screenshot quality settings
userStories.description: Allow users to choose screenshot resolution.

userStories.title: Add share button hover animation
userStories.description: Make share button more interactive.
acceptanceCriteria: Add CSS hover effect to share button
Button scales up slightly (1.1x) on hover
Add background color shift on hover

userStories.title: Create share achievement when first share
userStories.description: Celebrate user's first share action.
acceptanceCriteria: Track if user has ever shared

userStories.title: Add share streak counter
userStories.description: Track consecutive days with shares.
acceptanceCriteria: Track days when user shares packs
Display streak in share modal: '3 day share streak!'

userStories.title: Implement share cooldown
userStories.description: Prevent share spam with rate limiting.
acceptanceCriteria: During cooldown, share button is disabled

userStories.title: Add share history export
userStories.description: Allow users to export share history.
acceptanceCriteria: Export CSV with: date, platform, packId

userStories.title: Create shareable GIF animation
userStories.description: Generate animated GIF of card reveal.
acceptanceCriteria: Record card flip animation as GIF
Use GIF as shareable image instead of PNG
Test GIF plays on social platforms

userStories.title: Add share button to card detail modal
userStories.description: Allow sharing individual cards from collection.
acceptanceCriteria: Add share button to card detail view
Button generates screenshot of single card
Share includes card name and rarity

userStories.title: Add 'Share All Mythics' feature
userStories.description: Special share when pack has multiple mythics.
acceptanceCriteria: Detect if pack has 2+ mythic cards
Button creates collage of just mythic cards

userStories.title: Implement share preview in modal
userStories.description: Show preview of what will be shared.
acceptanceCriteria: Generate preview image before user shares
Show preview in modal (above platform buttons)
User can see exactly what will be shared

userStories.title: Add share reminder on pack complete
userStories.description: Prompt user to share after pack opening.
acceptanceCriteria: After all cards revealed, show subtle reminder
Test reminder encourages sharing without being annoying

userStories.title: Create share leaderboard
userStories.description: Show most shared packs of all time.
acceptanceCriteria: Display: share count, best card, sharer name
